code: import{baseUrl}from"..";import{AddCategoryAction}from"../store/categoryReducer";import{AddProductsAction,filterProductsAction}from"../store/productsReducer";export var fetchCategory=function fetchCategory(id){return function(dispatch){fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/categories/").concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return dispatch(AddCategoryAction(data));});};};export var fetchAllProductsList=function fetchAllProductsList(){return function(dispatch){fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/products/all")).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return dispatch(AddProductsAction(data));});};};export var fetchAllSalesProductsList=function fetchAllSalesProductsList(){return function(dispatch){fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/products/all")).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){dispatch(AddProductsAction(data));dispatch(filterProductsAction(true));});};};
